verses.verse: יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD מָ֭לָךְ <S%H4427><s%> Ma-loch reigneth תָּגֵ֣ל <S%H1523><s%> ta-Gel rejoice הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; let the earth יִ֝שְׂמְח֗וּ <S%H8055><s%> yis-me-Chu, be glad אִיִּ֥ים <S%H339><s%> 'i-Yim of isles רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim. let the multitude

עָנָ֣ן <S%H6051><s%> 'a-Nan Clouds וַעֲרָפֶ֣ל <S%H6205><s%> va-'a-ra-Fel and darkness סְבִיבָ֑יו <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-Vav; [are] round about צֶ֥דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek him righteousness וּ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-Pat, and judgment מְכ֣וֹן <S%H4349><s%> me-Chon [are] the habitation כִּסְאֽוֹ׃ <S%H3678><s%> kis-'O. of his throne

אֵ֭שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh A fire לְפָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav before תֵּלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> te-Lech; goes וּתְלַהֵ֖ט <S%H3857><s%> u-te-la-Het him and burneth up סָבִ֣יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv round about צָרָֽיו׃ <S%H6862><s%> tza-Rav. his enemies

הֵאִ֣ירוּ <S%H215><s%> he-'I-ru enlightened בְרָקָ֣יו <S%H1300><s%> ve-ra-Kav His lightnings תֵּבֵ֑ל <S%H8398><s%> te-Vel; the world רָאֲתָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> ra-'a-Tah saw וַתָּחֵ֣ל <S%H2342><s%> vat-ta-Chel and trembled הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the earth

הָרִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim, The hills כַּדּוֹנַ֗ג <S%H1749><s%> kad-do-Nag, like wax נָ֭מַסּוּ <S%H4549><s%> Na-mas-su melted מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mil-lif-Nei at the presence יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD מִ֝לִּפְנֵ֗י <S%H6440><s%> mil-lif-Nei, at the presence אֲד֣וֹן <S%H113><s%> a-Don of the Lord כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the whole earth

הִגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> hig-Gi-du declare הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim The heavens צִדְק֑וֹ <S%H6664><s%> tzid-Ko; his righteousness וְרָא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'U see כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol and all הָעַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim and all the people כְּבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3519><s%> ke-vo-Do. his glory

יֵבֹ֤שׁוּ׀ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu Confounded כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עֹ֬בְדֵי <S%H5647><s%> oe-dei be all they that serve פֶ֗סֶל <S%H6459><s%> Fe-sel, graven images הַמִּֽתְהַלְלִ֥ים <S%H1984><s%> ham-mit-hal-Lim that boast בָּאֱלִילִ֑ים <S%H457><s%> ba-'e-li-Lim; themselves of idols הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ <S%H7812><s%> hish-ta-cha-vu- worship ל֝וֹ lo כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. him all [ye] gods

שָׁמְעָ֬ה <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'Ah heard וַתִּשְׂמַ֨ח׀ <S%H8055><s%> vat-tis-Mach and was glad צִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon, Zion וַ֭תָּגֵלְנָה <S%H1523><s%> Vat-ta-ge-le-nah rejoiced בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> be-Not and the daughters יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an Because מִשְׁפָּטֶ֣יךָ <S%H4941><s%> mish-pa-Tei-cha because of thy judgments יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. O LORD

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For thou LORD עֶלְי֥וֹן <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon [art] high above עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; all the earth מְאֹ֥ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od far above נַ֝עֲלֵ֗יתָ <S%H5927><s%> na-'a-Lei-ta, thou art exalted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. all gods

אֹהֲבֵ֥י <S%H157><s%> 'o-ha-Vei Ye that love יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD שִׂנְא֫וּ <S%H8130><s%> sin-'U hate רָ֥ע <S%H7451><s%> ra' evil שֹׁ֭מֵר <S%H8104><s%> mer he preserveth נַפְשׁ֣וֹת <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shot the souls חֲסִידָ֑יו <S%H2623><s%> cha-si-Dav; of his saints מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad them out of the hand רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im, of the wicked יַצִּילֵֽם׃ <S%H5337><s%> yatz-tzi-Lem. he delivereth

א֭וֹר <S%H216><s%> or Light זָרֻ֣עַ <S%H2232><s%> za-Ru-a' is sown לַצַּדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> latz-tzad-Dik; for the righteous וּֽלְיִשְׁרֵי־ <S%H3477><s%> u-le-yish-rei- for the upright לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> lev in heart שִׂמְחָֽה׃ <S%H8057><s%> sim-Chah. and gladness

שִׂמְח֣וּ <S%H8055><s%> sim-Chu Rejoice צַ֭דִּיקִים <S%H6662><s%> Tzad-di-kim ye righteous בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; in the LORD וְ֝הוֹד֗וּ <S%H3034><s%> ve-ho-Du, and give thanks לְזֵ֣כֶר <S%H2143><s%> le-Ze-cher at the remembrance קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho. of his holiness
